ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | erclwwlk.r | |- .~ = { <. u , w >. | ( u e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) u = ( w cyclShift n ) ) } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_erclwwlkrel | |- Rel .~ |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( Rel .~ -> Rel .~ ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_erclwwlksym | |- ( x .~ y -> y .~ x ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( Rel .~ /\ x .~ y ) -> y .~ x ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_erclwwlktr | |- ( ( x .~ y /\ y .~ z ) -> x .~ z ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( Rel .~ /\ ( x .~ y /\ y .~ z ) ) -> x .~ z ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_erclwwlkref | |- ( x e. ( V ClWWalks E ) <-> x .~ x ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( Rel .~ -> ( x e. ( V ClWWalks E ) <-> x .~ x ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 5, 7, 9 | #P_iserd | |- ( Rel .~ -> .~ Er ( V ClWWalks E ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_ax-mp | |- .~ Er ( V ClWWalks E ) |
